wrote: 
Sorry to press. I know you haven't had this long. The AML folks atMare anxious to close these accounts unless the 
government requests that we not do so, and they asked me to check in. If there's someone on the team you'd rather I 
harass, let me know. 
Thanks. 
Nit

From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Tuesday, October 01, 2019 7:45 PM 
To: Bourtin, Nicolas 
Cc: Levin, Sharon Cohen
Subject: [EXTERNAL] Re: / Epstein 
Thanks very much, Nic. I will discuss with the team and I or one of them will get back to you. 
Best, 
: 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 1, 2019, at 7:20 PM, Bourtin, Nicolas . 
it> 
wrote: 
As I mentioned last night, attached is a SAR that filed today in connection with persons 
associated with Jeffrey Epstein. The bank would like to close all of the accounts of the entities named 
in the SAR as soon as possible. (The current balance on those accounts is approximately $30 million.) 
Before doing so, the bank wanted to make your office aware of these accounts in case the government 
intends to take any action. 
Please advise once you've had a chance to consider. 
Many thanks. 
Nic 
Nicolas Bourtin I Sullivan & Cromwell LLP 
125 Broad Street I New York, NY 10004.2498 
This e-mail is sent by a law firm and contains information that may be privileged and 
confidential. If you are not the intended recipient, please delete the e-mail and notify us 
immediately. 
<TD Filed SAR 2019-43693.do.pdf> 
**This is an external message from: 
** 
EFTA00015853
